name: Harsh Weather
description:
A game made from a Unity Course, this is my first time in making a game. I'm very proud that I pushed through with this game/course, it seems daunting at first but the end result was worth it.

I will continue and discover what this journey may bring and maybe someday I can bring you a worthy level of fun. Feel free to show your support and comment on the game, I am open to all criticism.

Controls:
Left and Right Arrow Keys     =     Moves left and right
Up Arrow Key                                =     Jump Move
Space Bar Key                                =     Dash Move 

Note: I added a few features that's not in the course like..
Jump Move
Immunity
Dash Cooldown
Healing
Health Bar instead of a Heart Counter
Timer
